item.title: Blog
item.description: Below are some links to my writing in various mediums. More to come… SOON! Artificial Intelligence 101 Indindagous Communities in Canada SideWalk Labs and Toronto DiverseCity Fellowship

item.title: Consulting
item.description: Living in 5 different cities in the past 10 years, city building has always been my path to observe new cities and connect with various communities. That’s how I decided to take my passion into the next level by specializing in smart cities and urban data analytics at UCL, London to further explore how technology could bring various communities closer. Ping me a line if you want to further discuss smart cities strategy and startups, inclusive city building and public speaking or/and about below initiatives .

item.title: Public Speaking
item.description: I have 5 years of cumulative experience in product/innovation strategy in various industries. From helping public sector leaders with their digital transformation programs, partnering with startups on formulating and branding their digital products and advising founders with their outreach strategy and growth. Ping me a line if you want to further discuss product growth, digital marketing, product innovation, digital transformation or/and about below projects. Projects Deloitte: My last engagement was with a top Canadian bank helping them with project management, quality assurance and governance support.

item.title: من أنا
item.description: !حاليا أنهي دراستي في المدن الذكية والحضرية في جامعة كوليج، لندن كندا وأساعد المدن والوكالات الحكومية في تخطيط وإدارة برامج التحول المختلفة الخاصة بهم Deloitte أعمل كمستشار إداري (Royal Bank)عملت أيضًا في أكبر مؤسسة مالية في كندا حصلت على شهادة BBA في الإعلان والاتصالات ، وبدأت ثلاث شركات ناشئة في ثلاث دول شاركت بشكل كبير في بناء الجسور بين العديد من المجتمعات من خلال مبادرات اجتماعية مختلفة

item.title: About
item.description: Whether it is a new operating model to implement, a business opportunity, or a political dilemma, I need to grasp it. Currently finishing my studies in smart cities and urban at UCL, London! I’m strategy and operations consultant at Deloitte Canada, helping cities and government agencies in their planning and managing their various transformation programs. Prior to Deloitte, I worked as a digital marketing consultant helping small businesses grow.
